section:
Référence de l'interface DelegatorFactoryInterface DelegatorFactoryInterface Graphe d'héritage de DelegatorFactoryInterface:
Graphe de collaboration de DelegatorFactoryInterface:
Fonctions membres publiques
createDelegatorWithName (ServiceLocatorInterface $serviceLocator, $name, $requestedName, $callback)
Fonctions membres publiques hérités de DelegatorFactoryInterface
__invoke (ContainerInterface $container, $name, callable $callback, ?array $options=null)
Description détaillée
Backwards-compatibility shim for DelegatorFactoryInterface.
Implementations should update to implement only Laminas\ServiceManager\Factory\DelegatorFactoryInterface.
If upgrading from v2, take the following steps:
rename the method createDelegatorWithName() to __invoke(), and:
rename the $serviceLocator argument to $container, and change the typehint to Interop\Container\ContainerInterface
merge the $name and $requestedName arguments
add the callable typehint to the $callback argument
add the optional array $options = null argument as a final argument
create a createDelegatorWithName() method as defined in this interface, and have it proxy to __invoke(), passing $requestedName as the second argument.
Once you have tested your code, you can then update your class to only implement Laminas\ServiceManager\Factory\DelegatorFactoryInterface, and remove the createDelegatorWithName() method.
Obsolète
Use Laminas\ServiceManager\Factory\DelegatorFactoryInterface instead.
Documentation des fonctions membres
createDelegatorWithName() createDelegatorWithNameDelegatorFactoryInterface DelegatorFactoryInterfacecreateDelegatorWithName
createDelegatorWithName (ServiceLocatorInterface $serviceLocator, $name, $requestedName, $callback)
A factory that creates delegates of a given service
Paramètres
ServiceLocatorInterface$serviceLocator
the service locator which requested the service
string$name
the normalized service name
string$requestedName
the requested service name
callable$callback
the callback that is responsible for creating the service
Renvoie
mixed
La documentation de cette interface a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/vendor/laminas/laminas-servicemanager/src/DelegatorFactoryInterface.php
